We are coming to this place whenever we want delicious meal and friendly small...tal talks.

We stumbled across this nice place in the jungle near Polwatta bridge and ended up eating and chilling there every day while we were in Weligama. At first we were cautious about so many top score reviews, but it all happened to be just as...people say - delicious food, spacious and clean 2 floor interior with great design, very nice and welcoming owners and staff, great music, surf movies, boardgames and hookahs. Overall this is a place you want to be and are happy to return! Guys, thanks for the all things you doing! 
Best place to spend evenings in Weligama - tasty food, perfect hookah, games, movies, interesting events and friendly atmosphere. 
I fall in love with your TomYam soup, tuna steak, burgers, smoothies and desserts!!!

We came here for a relaxed lunch and a hideaway from the heat. Line Up Cafe is perfect for it. Great design, outstandingly welcoming service and delicious food. We came here again for dinner and there was a DJ playing nice music, sometimes they have...movie, live music or board game nights. Everything we tried from the menu was perfect! Tuna in all forms was the best ever (steak, carpaccio, tar-tar), drinks were also great! (we had refreshing guava, tropical lemonade and smoothies).
Owners and staff take great care of their guests making them feel at the right place at the right time!

Definitely recommend!
